xmldoc.short_description: Convert a serial date number into a date vector.

syntax.syntax_item: [Y, M, D, H, MN, S] = datevec(dv)

param_input_item.param_description: a scalar, vector, or multidimensional array e: a serial date number.

param_output_item.param_name: Y, M, D, H, MN, S
param_output_item.param_description: double: Year, Month, Day, Hour, Minutes, Seconds.
a vector of double: [Year, Month, Day, Hour, Minutes, Seconds].

description.p: datevec converts a serial date number into a date vector.
To measure performance, it is better to use tic and toc functions.

example_item.example_item_data: datevec(now()) datevec(720840) V = datevec([720840, now()]) [Y, M, D, H, MN, S] = datevec([720840, now()])
